mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_exhibition WHERE exno > 0 ORDER BY exno, regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_exhibition(exno, mememail, memid, title, picture, content, regdate) VALUES (seq_exhibition.nextval, #{mememail}, #{memid}, #{title}, #{picture}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_exhibition SET title = #{title}, picture = #{picture}, content = #{content}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE exno = #{exno}
